typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		HK_PROMOTION_ID as string,
		PROMOTION_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubPromotion
source(output(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubItem
AzureSQLHubPromotion select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTableData
SelectTableData derive(HK_ITEM_ID = md5(item_id),
		LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'ITEM_INFO') ~> Expression
CheckItemIDExists alterRow(insertIf(iif(isNull(HK_ITEM_ID),true(),false()))) ~> UpdateStrategy
Expression, AzureSQLHubItem exists(SelectTableData@item_id == AzureSQLHubItemLookup@ITEM_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckItemIDExists
UpdateStrategy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_ITEM_ID,
		ITEM_ID = item_id,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> AzureSQLLnkItemPromotion
